definitions.Qing1 ming2: Qingming or Pure Brightness, 5th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 5th-19th April; Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day (in early April);
definitions.qing1 ming2: clear and bright; sober and calm; (of a government or administration) well ordered;
